==Trivia==
* {{w|Tuxtla_Gutiérrez|Tuxtla}} derives from the Nahuatl word ''{{wt|Tuxtla|Tochtlan}}'' or ''Tuxtlan''. It is the name of the capital of Chiapas, Mexico.
===Etymology=== 
* ''Tochlan'' (From {{w|Nahuatl}}: ''Tochtlan'') means "Near the Rabbits."
